name: Chaos Sorcerer Lord

abilities.name: The Power of Chaos
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the Chaos Sorcerer Lord's attack roll, its Damage is doubled.

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. While it is there, players can re-roll any save rolls of 1 for the Chaos Sorcerer Lord and any other heroes in the same chamber.

renown: If you slay an enemy using the Power of Chaos, gain 1 additional renown.
